#Text= Dai Li agent says : " Your Majesty , we received a distress signal from the airship carrying the prisoners .

column1: #Text=We believed the ship crashed in the Si Wong desert and the Avatar may have escaped .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " This is outrageous !
#Text=Send another airship to retrieve the Avatar immediately .
#Text=" Dai Li agent says : " It 's already on its way , Your Majesty .
#Text=" Ming - Hua says : " What are we going to do now ?
#Text=" Ghazan says : " There 's no way we can track her down in the desert before the queen gets to her .
#Text=" P'Li says : " You really think we 'd be lucky enough to capture her again ?
#Text=She 'll be long gone by the time they arrive .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " It does n't matter .
#Text=We 're through chasing her .
#Text=It 's time to make her come to us .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " What is this riff - raff doing in my throne room unannounced ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Apologies , Your Majesty .
#Text=But I could n't help overhearing that the Avatar wo n't be joining us today .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " The Avatar is still in my custody .
#Text=However , eavesdropping on royal conversations will land you in a cell right next to those boys you brought in .
#Text=Now , if you value your freedom , you 'll tell me where the airbenders are right now !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " That was n't the deal .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " I will not bandy words with bounty hunters !
#Text=Seize these hoodlums and throw them in prison until they decide to show proper respect for the crown !
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " Gun !
#Text=Get in back here and lay down your life for your queen , you coward !
#Text=You would n't dare attack a queen !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Maybe I forgot to mention something to you .
#Text=I do n't believe in queens .
#Text=You think freedom is something that you can give or take on a whim ... To your people ... freedom is just as essential as ... air .
#Text=And without it ... there is no life .
#Text=There is only ... darkness .
#Text="
